subdisciplines.name: Analytic Number Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of the properties of the integers and their generalizations using analytic methods such as complex analysis.

subdisciplines.name: Algebraic Number Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of the properties of algebraic numbers and their generalizations.

subdisciplines.name: Computational Number Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of algorithms for doing number theory, including primality testing, factorization, and discrete logarithms.

subdisciplines.name: Geometric Number Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of the properties of the integers and their generalizations using geometric and algebraic geometry methods.

subdisciplines.name: Probabilistic Number Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of probabilistic properties of the integers and their generalizations.
